评论详情: Really thick. Would buy again.
Thick, warm, and too stinking cute!! Beautiful color and fits a bit oversized which I love! Bought for 6 month sizing and at 10 months it still fits my 65th percentile boy!
Super nice quality and so soft!
Great color, matches picture and description, cute
It’s very thick and warm. Super cute on my baby. We love it
This cute little romper is a definite great find. The Fabric quality is pleasant surprise and the size, color and fit are perfection!
Over sized sweatshirt fit. The material is thick and good quality. Adorable
Super thick and soft but runs a little small. And my son is only 30th percentile.
So stinking cute! This outfits makes for great pictures. The material is very soft and good quality!

评论概述: Returned become way too big, refund taking almost a MONTH
评论详情: Item was cute but way too big. Nothing wrong with it. Didn't damage item, remove tag or anything. Returned it as I received it. Never had issues returning items before til now and it's taking almost a MONTH to receive a refund. Ridiculous.
I ordered a 0-3 months and they sent me a size 70 which is apparently 6-12 months. It’s super cute but I wanted him to wear it now so I’m a little frustrated.
Fleece on inside so it’s super warm, runs a tad small, the 6-12 month size fits more like 6-9. Overall very good for the price and is great for winter
The package says 0-3 months but what I received was definitely for a 9-12 month old. Will be returning.
Faded not as expected. Sad because it’s been in my cart for months
Such a cute sweatshirt. It’s soft and warm for baby. It’s easy to put on with the extra snaps by the neckline.
Love this bubble sweatsuit! It is very well made and soft. Great for a fall or winter day for my grandson!

This little bubble outfit is so cute and comfy! It’s pretty good quality for the price and is a cozy sweatshirt material. It does fit pretty small, so I would order a size up. The stains do not come with it, my son is just messy🤣
SOOO CUTE
Looked so cute on my baby!
Looks like great quality and so cute
Great quality, heavy sweatshirt material, definitely oversized. Washed great with no pulling so far. It’s exactly as I thought it would be from the description.
Soft cute, soft
This is so soft I wish I could wear it. It's so cute and fits well on my baby
just like the picture. true to size & super thick to keep him warm no strings or nothing hanging off from what i’ve seen
Not only is this cute, but the material and fit is perfect! Bought this for a new mama and her baby boy looks so cute in it!
This baby sweatshirt is absolutely adorable. Fit is great. My baby is 8 months and this fit just how I wanted it to. It has a baggy look but not too big. So soft too! Definitely recommend 😊
The proportions of this were really weird for newborn clothes. It was very short and wide. Returned.
fit my baby perfectly! I love the oversized look. comfortable and cute!
So cute and comfortable but the size is much bigger than newborn. Good quality and value for money!
This is adorable! Great quality.

This sweatshirt timber is SO soft! I was absolutely shocked at how good the quality is, even after a couple washes! It does have some stretch to it so I know we will get a lot of use out of it despite how fast they grow. Love the simplicity of the design and how cozy (yet not too snug) the fit is! Honestly for the price it’s a must in your baby’s closet!!
Great quality
it is so cute and soft! makes a great gift or keepsake for yourself. really good price. holds up nicely; i hang dry a lot of laundry so i cant speak on behalf of using dryer.
Bought this as a shower gift and was very pleased! The recipient love it as well!

Very good quality and so soft! I bought this for my daughter when she was 2 months old and it was so cute. We had to roll the sleeves a little bit but she hates pants so this fit great for her to wear on some milder weather days.
Cute, but runs large. Very thick sweatshirt material.
Looks adorable on my little boy. Definitely runs a bit big
Put into the washer one time and the bunny tail popped off, but only bought the product for pictures and got the pictures done before the incident happened
Beautiful color and quality.  I think they ran a bit bigger than I expected, but still looked fine for the ride home.
Had stains on the outfit when I received it.

Just what I ordered! Super cute, semi stretchy material. Easy to put on my newborn with a t shirt onsie underneath. Kept him nice and cozy at zoo! I hung dry it after I washed it, but I hang dry all my kiddos clothes. It hasn’t frayed or balled up in any way! Happy with it 😊
I bought this as a baby shower gift for my nephew. Was great quality, and loved the touch of stitching !!

Everything about it is so cute and I love it...except the color. I ordered black and got brown. Not sure if it was an error in packaging the wrong color or their black just isn't very black. Otherwise it's great. Good quality fabric, strong buttons, very cute!
Sweater onesie is every cute and fit my daughter with a little room to grow.
The sweater was so cute and thick. It will definitely keep your baby warm.
In love! Especially for the price!!!
This is super cute and soft it fits true to size and washed well.  We will see how it holds up

This bubble romper is so adorable! It’s affordable and warm. The only thing is i wish the neck area was a little looser because it is a little snug going over my babies face so he hates that.  I will buy bigger sizes in the future!

评论概述: Darling little romper, bulky with pants over it
评论详情: This little romper is super cute, but I'm not sure if I'm supposed to put pants underneath it or over it. When I put pants over it, it's kind of bulky and weird looking, but it also looks strange when I put them under it.

评论概述: Fleece lined sweatshirts are hard to find for babies!
评论详情: I love the sweatshirt because it is fleece lined. I find a lot of the children’s sweatsuits have more of a terrycloth interior. Living in New England, a warm sweatshirt is important to me rather than just aesthetics. The quality is good, stitching without imperfection. Snaps in the crotch are secure and work well.
I can't wait for my nephew to pop out cuz this is so dang cute

This was the best money ever spent! I ordered this based off a an influencer's feedback and it did not disappoint. My little guy looks so cute and stylish at an affordable price! The material is thick and soft. The 6-12 months fit my 15 lb 6 month old perfect. I would definitely size up if looking for a larger baby.

Hello World in beige is simply adorable! The cursive writing is easy to read, and adds to the love of this cute onesie. It's trendy for the oversize sweatshirt appearance. The snaps are quick and easy to change baby. My co worker is over the moon with this gift. Nice quality for the value.
Cute! Nice material that is thick and comfy. Will definitely keep baby warm. It has some stretch to it but I’d say the right size.
While the design is cute, the fabric is pretty synthetic. I worry that if the baby is going to sweat a lot in it

评论概述: Adorable but the black is more brown
评论详情: I'm impressed this came much faster than anticipated- right in time for Halloween! I got the "Little Boo" in black, but it's definitely brown. That said, it came out so cute for Halloween pictures! It's light but warm, and the 12-18 month size seems true to size or maybe a tad small. The "bubble style makes it look like an oversized sweatshirt, but with a better fit. It's good quality fabric and stitching, and little one seemed very comfortable in it! Can't beat the cuteness, especially at this price!
This little sweater bodysuit is so adorable! The quality seems to be quite nice. The fabric is soft & very comfy feeling. I think my baby is really going to enjoy wearing it this fall.
This fits true-to-size and it’s so incredibly soft.
Soft and comfy sweatshirt Onsie that fits as expected. Great stitching and quality material and snap closure. Bought this as a fun outfit to wear around Halloween and it’s so cute! Great purchase.

These are such cute little outfits! I have a few for my son and I love the cute sayings on them. They do run true to size as well. Size up if you want them to have a little extra room in them. Can’t wait for my son to wear this leading up to Halloween.
Good material will be nice for the seasons coming up

评论概述: Really cute for a few wears but has some drawbacks
评论详情: So this is described as a black "bubble" romper. It's more of a lightweight sweatshirt material but has no "bubbling" that is typical of these. It is also more of a dark brown than a black. The embroidery is nice for the words "little boo". I don't think the fabric is the highest quality. I will get a few wears out of this for little one around Halloween but thats probably it.
Super soft material. Feels like a cozy sweatshirt. Very warm! Easy snaps for diaper changing. Beautiful soft blue color.

This is a warm, cozy, and thick sweatshirt. The snaps make it easy to get on and off. It did not shrink after washing! The sizes fit as expected and the leg holes are big enough to fit comfortably around his thighs.
This is a thick, cozy material and is great quality.
Thicker than I was expecting and great for colder months. Looks like description and fits as expected
My baby is two months & it fits him great. Very warm and the material is very soft.
Such a cute newborn sweatshirt. It's thick and made with quality material yet lightweight. Perfect gift for a newborn.
My nephew is going to slay in this hahah literally such good quality I kinda want one in my size
Comfy and cute, more of an oversized look. Great for lounging around the house! Snaps easily.

评论概述: Nice quality and cute to boot!
评论详情: Very pleased with this baby sweatshirt. Material is 95% cotton and both thick and soft in a beautiful shade of blue. ‘Little dude’ is embroidered on there (mine has one stray string hanging out but easy enough to snip that). Snaps at crotch and shoulder make it easy to put on. Size is as expected. Would definitely order again in another color or size.

I got this little onesie for my newborn nephew. It was long sleeved, and I liked that with the colder weather coming in. The outside is plain with one color and the “little dude” is embroidered into the inside and not printed on, which helps with its washability. I’m sure he will outgrow it relatively quickly but it’s cute to see it on him in the meantime.

评论概述: Too Small, but Nice Material - Thick and Warm
评论详情: This runs a little small, but if you order a size up, you should be ok. Well worth the sizing for the warmth and comfort. The material is like a very soft fleece-like. Looks great. Very high quality shirt/onesie overall. Lettering is attached to be very durable for much longer than 2 or 3 kids can wear it. Sizing isn't obvious on the shirt tag so if you do pass it along, you'll just have to guess at the size. Mine came with a tag that just says 90. No clue what that means. I should add the snaps are also heavy duty. It comes with snaps on the left shoulder and the crotch area. The material is so thick that snapping can be a little difficult, especially if you have a squirmy baby, like mine. Some determination can overcome that slight drawback.

评论概述: Nice and heavy - will be warm for winter!
评论详情: Just what every little dude needs! It is nice and thick, so he'll be warm this winter, and it seems to be built well.

This sweatshirt onesie is so comfy and perfect for cooler weather! Very thick and good quality materials. I like that's it's a onesie so his sweatshirt isn't constantly riding up his belly. The graphic is cute and the color is wonderful.  The snaps at the bottom are a tad hard to use but they may break in over time.  We love this sweatshirt so far!

This is a nice embroider bubble for a baby! The inside is a soft fleece and the embroidery seems to be of good quality. I like that the top has buttons to ensure a good fit. The color is a nice muted/neutral blue. I haven’t washed it yet but hopefully the quality will keep.
This onesie is great for fall! The material is thick and will keep my baby warm during the cold weather. I love the embroidery and the onesie is great value for money!
This sweater is super cute. It's soft, and it fit my nephew perfect. Now I have something for him to wear whenever I keep him.

This is honestly the cutest romper, and I am impressed by how thick the fabric is and how cute the stitching looks, especially for how low the price is! Big win.  I am just bummed and deducted a star because one of the snaps on the romper I got is only attached to one side of the onesie, so it's not functional until I figure out how to glue or stitch it back to its side.
This bubble inside is such a good quality, for that price, 1000% worth it!!
Good quality, fleece inside, looks like a cute oversized sweater for a baby!
